title: Bug
body:
I found a bug where if you go to a friends profile and then you disconnect from your wifi and pressing your profile then you can see your friends champs and masteryscore
- Step 1, go to your friends profile
-Step 2, Disconnect from wifi
- Step 3, DWhile disconected press your wifi and reconect, then you go to champions and you can se the friend champs and mastery score

Proof
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y8zdgauP2VI
That video is where i can see my friends masteryscore. you can also see that he have thresh lvl 5 and i dont even have that champ. In the top left it sais vägg and thats my account, it only sais that becouse im on my profile but im on his champs, its hard to explain i hope you understand. 
Btw that is Skt Bronze masteryscores so you can check that.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q42E7dNlP8k
this is the second vieo where its my profile and my masteryscore. i hope this helped but im not sure if you understand, if you want me to explain it to you on skype or something then add me on league Euw and i can explain in person.

replies.body:
Thanks for posting this. To ensure this gets more visibility and can be properly tracked, I recommend reposting this in our [Bug Report section](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) of the Boards. 

Let me know if you have any questions.
